name: ExpansionParameters
title: Expansion Parameters
description: Specifies the expansion parameters that should be used to expand ValueSets referenced from artifacts in the Library or ImplementationGuide.

element.definition: Specifies the expansion parameters that should be used to expand ValueSets referenced from artifacts in the Library or ImplementationGuide.
element.comment: Expansion parameters specified in an ImplementationGuide override expansion parameters specified in dependency IGs, and can in turn be overridden by expansion parameters specified in downstream IGs, where _override_ in this context means a complete replacement (i.e. there is no attempt to merge parameters from upstream implementation guides). When this extension is used, it is intended to be binding (i.e. expansion SHALL take the expansion parameters into account, according to the Expansion Rules discussed in the CRMI Artifact Terminology Service [Expansion Rules](http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/crmi/artifact-terminology-service.html#expansion-rules) topic.
